incomeTaxes.name: Base Income Tax
incomeTaxes.notes: 2024 base tax rate (bundskat) plus labor market contribution (AM-bidrag) at 8%. Additional municipal tax (kommuneskat) varies by municipality (average 24.98%). Thresholds in DKK.

incomeTaxes.name: Municipal Income Tax
incomeTaxes.notes: 2024 average municipal tax rate (kommuneskat). Actual rates vary by municipality between 22.8% and 26.3%.

wealthTaxes.name: Wealth Tax
wealthTaxes.notes: Denmark abolished its wealth tax (formueskat) in 1997. No general wealth tax currently exists.

capitalGainsTaxes.name: Share Income Tax
capitalGainsTaxes.notes: 2024 tax rates for shares and dividends (aktieindkomst). Thresholds in DKK.
